title: UX/UI Designer
description:
Do you want to change the world through digital design by working on socially impactful and meaningful projects?
If your answer is yes, then this is the opportunity you've been waiting for!
----------
OUR OPPORTUNITY:
We‚Äôre in search of an experienced, award-winning UX/UI DESIGNER to develop interactive projects and impactful interactive experiences‚Ä¶ you'll work on both award-winning projects and day to day client needs. As our new UX/UI DESIGNER, you'll work alongside our other in-house Developers, Designers and Project Managers to lead our agency to higher heights and deeper depths.
You'll work closely with designers/creatives to develop top-quality interactive products and tools, whilst coordinating with Project Managers to deliver projects on time and according to client's expectations, standards and timings‚Ä¶ In addition to this, you'll work on multiple projects simultaneously from initial briefing through to successful completion, you'll do this independently whilst at times collaborating with other members of the team.
----------
YOUR EXPERIENCE:
We'd love to hear from you if you have exposure and experience as a UX/UI DESIGNER in an agency environment, who has won high quality and award-winning interactive projects. You'd also ideally have knowledge of Project Execution Methodologies (waterfall and agile) and be able to propose process improvements. Along with the above, you'll have knowledge of Project Management Softwares (Trello, Basecamp, Jira, etc) and be fluent in the English language, both speaking and writing.
In addition to this, you'll ideally have experience in the following technologies:
- In-depth and proven career within UX/UI design space, within a digital agency developing top quality digital experiences (only candidates with a strong portfolio and a proven record will be considered);
- Expert knowledge in Sketch, Photoshop and Illustrator;
- Solid experience in collaborative projects with other designers and developers;
- The ability to balance creativity and production workload, under pressure with concurrent and conflicting deadlines;
- Experience in leading and or coordinating projects;
- Strategic thinking, you'll be able to identify industry trends and opportunities and shape the direction of projects.
BONUS POINTS:
- Participated in projects that have won awards and/or received special recognition;
- Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS and animation (after effects, Zeplin, etc.);
- You have worked as a freelance or ran/started a small studio before;
- You have experience in data visualization/information design projects;
- Possess After Effects Skills or other animation softwares.
----------
ABOUT US:
At Elkanodata, we transform complex information and data, into insightful, innovative and attractive user experiences.
Our clients are international organizations and thought leaders that are based in the United States and Europe, including, The World Economic Forum, The World Bank, The European Union and the United Nations; specifically based in New York, Washington D.C and Geneva.
We identify as a Creative Design Agency that's able to support our client groups across the digital spectrum ‚Äì Landing pages, websites, product launches and motion graphics.
We have an amazing and talented workforce that consists of Digital Designers, Art Directors, Front End Developers and Digital Project Managers to lead us to excellence.
OUR PURPOSE
We want to provide those that have been traditionally and systematically overlooked and or under-represented with a platform to showcase themselves through our agency, therefore leading to true and authentic representation. We want to change the world through digital design by connecting our client groups with their target audience; dismantling the current unwritten culture of "Us and Them".
OUR MISSION
We aim to use Information Design as a tool for social change, redefining the way people engage with relevant causes, and helping International Organizations make the most out of their information and data. We strive to build a more informed and inclusive society, some of our notable projects have been around supporting the LGBTQIA+ community, health care and awareness, and poverty prevention action plans and bridging the gap between gender disparity.
OUR VISION
At Elkanodata we aim to be the leaders in information design within Inter-Governmental Organizations (IGO) markets by 2022, offering the highest quality work to our clients from our multicultural and diverse team located in Barcelona.
OUR VALUES
Our values are centred around creating a safe, engaging and productive environment, whereby our people feel confident enough to bring their true and authentic selves to work... people are at the forefront of our business, we not only want to create a great work culture, but we want to change the world through each and everyone one of our employees... We do this by having a clear and defined learning and development, recognition, benefits and reward, and employee engagement strategy.
We're proud to have focused on true diversity and inclusion when hiring our current workforce, with a particular focus on neurodiversity, education, location, religion and practice, racial heritage, spoken languages, gender identity and sexual orientation. We believe having a wide variety of professionals working together inspires innovation, and allows us as an agency to revolutionize the projects that we work on through partnering with our client groups.
Elkanodata... American working culture, European creativity, and Mediterranean lifestyle.

title: WordPress/CMS Developer
description:
At netzstrategen we enable our customers to act independently in the digital world. For this, we need experts in all digital disciplines. 
What we are looking for:
Experience in and with: 
- WordPress and ideally another CMS (like Craft, Drupal, etc)
- PHP programming (OOP and procedural) and JavaScript
- WooCommerce or comparable eCommerce concepts
- Frontend development in HTML5, SASS, JS
- Developing new plugins and themes (ideally also published publicly like ours)
- HTTP headers and reverse proxy caching like Varnish and Nginx Cache
best practices and writing clean code

What you will be doing with us:
- Planning technical solutions for individual features and whole sites for customers
- Building new websites and online stores
- Coordinating with customers
- Reviewing giving constructive feedback
- Analyzing and optimizing the site performance
- Connecting enrichment services (Elasticsearch) and marketing automation tools (newsletters and CRMs)
- Developing custom data imports, exports, and migrations
- Contributing features and fixes to third-party plugin vendors and WordPress core
- Implementing automated tests and integrations with monitoring systems
- Integrating a pattern library and custom Gutenberg blocks into themes
- Customizing the frontend appearance
- Audits for our customers

Working with us looks like this: 
- Flexible working hours and home office are possible 
- Team full of experienced digital enthusiasts who love to exchange professional knowledge and enable learning
- A mentor that will be with you, supporting your new path with us
- There are fresh fruit, coffee and soft drinks in all offices
- Team activities and joint workshops alternately in our offices in Karlsruhe, Cologne and Barcelona.
- We support your further education 
- Work with the best conditions: Laptop, private health insurance, mobile phone contract, the right hardware, train ticket or Bicing card ‚Äì ride with us!
You should be familiar with these tools:
- Peer view and version control platforms like GitHub
- Command line tools like Git, Composer, npm, gulp, WP-CLI, SSH
- Project management tools like Asana
- Collaboration tools like Slack and Google Apps (GSuite)
With these people you will have the most to do:
- Developers
- Project Managers
- Customers
- Designers
- Analysts
- Marketeers
We would like to welcome you to our team. Contact us!

Start date: Immediately
Location: Barcelona or Karlsruhe
Compensation: 36,000 ‚Äì 48,000 EUR/year
Required experience: Minimum 4 years experience in the field

title: VP of Programming
description:
At Domestika we are hiring a VP of Programming to lead the development and execution of Domestika‚Äôs course content and creative talent strategy.
Reporting to the COO & Co-founder, as VP of Programming, you will be responsible for identifying and leading the global programming strategy, from content strategy, data analysis and the curation of teachers and courses, to the quality of the negotiations and relationships that are built with the professors at Domestika.
Domestika is one of the largest growing communities within the creative industry. We started as a small but dynamic platform for creative professionals, designed to help them connect and learn from each other. Today, Domestika designs and produces online courses in partnership with the best creative professionals in the world, made available to those who want to improve professionally or who love learning craft. The community has grown to overn 5 million people who share a curiosity and passion for learning creative skills.
The company is based in San Francisco, California, and our team is distributed across over 10 countries. Domestika has the support of one of the most relevant funds in Silicon Valley (USA).
What does a VP Programming do at Domestika?
‚Ä¢ Lead content strategy development, aligning with the global growth and marketing strategy.
‚Ä¢ Enhance revenue and profit by identifying business opportunities for monetizing content in the global landscape.
‚Ä¢ Formulate and implement a multi-year content plan across different countries, areas of creative expertise and languages.
‚Ä¢ Identify the best creative talent globally, craft the right collaboration structures, and bring those opportunities to life. Act as the representative of Domestika in relationships with key talent across the world.
‚Ä¢ Lead a team that works across the globe to identify leading, prominent professionals in various creative fields to join the community of world-renowned Domestika teachers.
‚Ä¢ Ensure that the relationships built with the community of prospects and teachers at Domestika reflect our values and are enriching for our partners.
‚Ä¢ Drive the Programming strategy internally to facilitate communication and collaboration; ensure that cross-functional stakeholders are in sync on key programming initiatives and delivery dates.
‚Ä¢ Lead a diverse team of senior managers operating as a player-coach, setting expectations, ensuring KPIs and deadlines are met and providing mentorship.
‚Ä¢ Support enterprise-wide initiatives as a member of the Leadership team.
Requirements:
‚Ä¢ 10+ years of work experience in programming, content & curation strategy, with international markets.
‚Ä¢ Minimum 5 years leadership and management experience in entertainment, marketing, creative or media-related businesses.
‚Ä¢ A proven leader of people and teams, experience leading global teams.
‚Ä¢ Experience with educational content consumption on digital platforms.
‚Ä¢ Strong analytical and data-driven background.
‚Ä¢ Detail oriented and analytical yet able to think strategically and creatively.
‚Ä¢ Exceptional communication skills; experience communicating with external partners, executives and creative talent, as well as with your cross-functional partners.
‚Ä¢ Prior experience in e-commerce or a marketplace business is a plus.
‚Ä¢ Prior experience in sales planning is a plus.
‚Ä¢ Fluent in English, working internationally, some Spanish would be a plus.
What do we offer?
‚Ä¢ Building one of the fastest growing companies in the creative industry.
‚Ä¢ Partnering with a fun, creative, collaborative and multicultural team.
‚Ä¢ The opportunity to be a key leader in the growth of Domestika.
‚Ä¢ High growth environment.
‚Ä¢ Remote work from wherever you are.
‚Ä¢ Attractive compensation & benefits.

title: VP of Product
description:
At Domestika we are looking for a VP of Product.
We are looking for a wunderbar VP of Product to drive and define our Product Strategy at Domestika in order to deliver the best experience for our users. We are currently transforming our Product team and the VP of Product will have the exciting opportunity to set the vision and raise the bar while helping bring the Product Strategy to a whole new level.
The VP of Product will define and take the lead in Product Management and the definition of the Roadmap, shape the best practices and help product teams make that happen.
You will also lead a product Management team and partner cross-functional teams, including UX Designers, Product Managers, Front and Back Software Engineers, and Data Scientists, to tackle complex challenges and craft intuitive experiences and new functionalities. This role is also responsible for defining the hiring Strategy for the Product Organization, championing a culture of drive, constructive feedback, execution, teamwork, fun and good people working hard with one common goal: building the best product to empower people.
Domestika is one of the largest growing communities within the creative industry. It all started as a small but dynamic showcase of creative professionals, designed to help them connect and learn from each other. Years later, born from this core value, Domestika widened its reach by designing and producing online courses for all those who want to learn and improve professionally with the best teachers. The community has grown to more than 6 million people who are constantly curious and passionate about learning new skills.
What does a VP of Product do at Domestika?
‚Ä¢ Responsible for the Roadmap to ensure it is aligned with Domestika‚Äôs priorities.
‚Ä¢ Lead the team towards excellence.
‚Ä¢ Strategic thinking with a very hands-on and proactive approach.
‚Ä¢ Work with the UX Team synergistically to continually raise the bar for the product's design quality.
Requirements:
‚Ä¢ 15+ years of experience working in Product.
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of experience and a proven track record of leading the Product Organization in a tech company.
‚Ä¢ Expertise leading multidisciplinary teams organized in squads.
‚Ä¢ Proven track record of setting the vision and delivering against the execution of roadmaps for native apps, web, and other devices for e-commerce or e-learning products.
‚Ä¢ Experience working in agile delivering high-quality work consistently.
‚Ä¢ Experience leading, building, hiring and engaging product teams.
‚Ä¢ Strong communication skills.
‚Ä¢ Proficiency in English, Spanish is a plus.
‚Ä¢ Ability to adapt to rapid and fast moving environments with great flexibility and a can do + get it done attitude.
‚Ä¢ Win as a team approach.
What do we offer?
‚Ä¢ Working in one of the leading companies in the creative industry.
‚Ä¢ Flexibility to work remotely at all times.
‚Ä¢ A creative, dynamic, exciting, collaborative, and multicultural team.
‚Ä¢ A fast-moving environment in which you can hone your skills, learn along with your colleagues, and grow professionally.
‚Ä¢ Innovative and startup environment.
‚Ä¢ Be part of the fastest-growing creative community in the world with more than 5M users worldwide and offices across 14 countries. We are rapidly expanding which offer plenty of great and challenging projects.
‚Ä¢ As part of Domestika you will have free access to all of our course catalog. We‚Äôve published more than 2000. Learn for free with the best creatives and artists in the world.
‚Ä¢ Enjoy your Private Medical Insurance as one of our benefits.
‚Ä¢ We are a multicultural environment -full of good people- and we enjoy diversity.

title: UI & Data visualization Specialist
description:
As a UI & Data visualization developer in the GAMMA UI team, you will be responsible for constructing rich Web Applications that feature elements of Data Visualisation and designing optimal interfaces to AI solutions which solve complex problems.
Creating reusable components using React which can be composed to form the next generation User Interfaces will be key to scale our capabilities at BCG GAMMA.
Your creative abilities will be critical on cases to transmit clarity to users when interfacing the work performed on the Back End of applications by our Data Scientists and AI Software Engineers.
You‚Äôll also play a pivotable role supporting other members of the GAMMA UI Team, and running training sessions for a wider audience demonstrating Best Practices for User Interface Design & Development.
YOU'RE GOOD AT :
Expressing empathy with end-users in order to design clear, effective UI solutions to complex problems.
Visualizing information and data which may not naturally fit onto a Cartesian Grid.
Determining how to render large magnitudes of data in a performant fashion in the web browser.
Writing reusable, functional JavaScript, and working alongside team members using Agile methodologies.
Working within time constraints whilst still going beyond the brief to bring delight to end-users
YOU BRING (EXPERIENCE & QUALIFICATIONS) :
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or Data Visualisation.
A Github/Codepen/Blog demonstrating your passion for Front End topics.
2-4+ years of experience in a Software Engineering role using JavaScript.
2+ years of experience with ReactJS.
Experience composing Azure/AWS/GCP microservices to interface backend functionality.
Creative experience with CSS, SVG, and ideally GSAP animation library.

title: IT Security Manager
description:
At Domestika we are looking for an IT Security Manager.
Domestika is one of the largest growing creative communities within the creative industry. It all started as a small but dynamic showcase of creative professionals, designed to help them connect and learn from each other.
Years later, born from this core value, Domestika widened its reach by designing and producing online courses for anyone who wanted to learn and improve professionally with the best teachers. The community has grown to more than 5 million people who are constantly curious and passionate about learning new skills.
What does an IT Security Manager do at Domestika?
As part of the IT team, you will play a key role in identifying any weak areas that might make information systems vulnerable. You will assess security measures such as anti-virus software, passwords, and firewalls in order to identify any areas that might make information systems vulnerable to attack. You will analyze reports generated by the monitoring system to identify anything that may indicate a future risk.
You will also manage backup and security systems, look after the recovery of data in disaster situations, and oversee security violation investigations. Often, simulated attacks are carried out in order to test the efficiency of the security measures that are in place.
The IT security manager also provides training for employees, explaining security risks as well as the need for using strong passwords and protecting data when using mobile devices outside the office.
‚Ä¢ Participate in the definition of the information security strategy and policies and ensure that they are aligned with business objectives.
‚Ä¢ Define the technical security measures that must be implemented to protect the assets of Domestika, as well as the control framework.
‚Ä¢ Enforce adherence to data security and data privacy rules in daily operations.
‚Ä¢ Identify specific requirements that must be covered by security providers, with a high degree of specialization and follow up on these security services provided by third parties.
‚Ä¢ Participate in purchasing activities such as requirement analysis, RFPs preparation, scoring of proposals, and providers selection.
‚Ä¢ Participate in assessments and service improvement programs regarding IT security.
‚Ä¢ Minimize security and technological compliance risks.
Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Good level of English and Spanish, both spoken and written.
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge in IAM technologies: OpenID, OAuth2, SSO, SAML, etc.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge in IT Security: ISO 27001, PKI, certificates, digital signature, CASB, IdAAS, DDoS, PUAM, SoC, SIEM, WAF, etc.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge in GDPR.
Hard skills:
‚Ä¢ High communication and negotiation skills, both with senior management and with development and operations teams.
‚Ä¢ Big-picture business-driven perspective.
‚Ä¢ Project Management skills.
‚Ä¢ Passion for technology.
‚Ä¢ Problem-solving and analytical capability.
Soft skills:
‚Ä¢ You have a hands-on attitude, and can be flexible when needed.
‚Ä¢ You enjoy collaborating with others and share knowledge.
‚Ä¢ You are curious and proactive.
‚Ä¢ You are open-minded and interested in learning new things.
What do we offer?
‚Ä¢ Working in one of the leading companies in the creative industry.
‚Ä¢ A creative, dynamic, exciting, collaborative, and multicultural team.
‚Ä¢ A fast-moving environment in which you can hone your skills, learn alongside your colleagues, and grow professionally.
‚Ä¢ A fully remote position.
‚Ä¢ An honest salary according to your experience and profile.

description:

En Rodanet no solo pedimos, tambi√©n ofrecemos:

¬øTe apuntas? ¬°Te esperamos!

title: Performance Marketing Specialist
description:
Do you have experience as a Performance Marketing?
About GELT
Gelt is a Madrid-based company that allows FMCG brands to run promotions to bring traffic to the physical point of sale, so that they buy their product.
How do we do it? Very easy, we have tried to reinvent coupons by returning the money to users for buying the products they like. The majority of users (80% to be exact) use our app inside the Supermarket, when they are in front of the shelf, and decide to buy the product that appears in the app because it has an incentive. The user buys the product (in any Supermarket), pays the price and by taking a photo of the purchase receipt, we take care of validating with the brand that it is a valid ticket and that the product was actually bought and we give the incentive that They can be 40 cents or 2 euros, whatever the brand decides. When the user reaches the accumulated ‚Ç¨ 20, we send him a code and he can go to an ATM to get his hard cash. That easy!
If you want to be in our team, we recommend that you start by getting to know our app. You can download it here: http://onelink.to/5dkhgp
We have also set up an ecosystem surrounded by projects such as GeltGiro, GeltPLus, among others, which allow us to launch new products to the market.
You would be part of this entire ecosystem and would cover the different projects, we also already have a powerful Technology team, are you up for it? Well, we detail what we are looking for.
Join us as a Performance Marketing Specialist and become a key member of Gelt‚Äôs Marketing team! We offer a challenging and dynamic environment with many opportunities for learning and development.
Be a part of a team where you will:
- Create, optimise and analyse performance marketing campaigns.
- A/B testing and incremental tests (channels, creatives, biddings, formats, etc.)
- Optimise towards all post-install metrics (down funnel from sign up to LTV).
- Proactively search for new ideas to improve our creatives by working with local, design, users and comms teams. 
- Constantly dive into campaign performance metrics to surface new learnings and drive continuous improvements to KPIs.
- Learn UA and Retention strategies on web and mobile.
You have:
- Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Business, Math or Engineering
- Superior knowledge of all common web and mobile ad tech platforms (AppsFlyer, Google AdWords and Facebook Ads)
- Analytical mindset with an ability to organise and crunch data, interpret metrics and identify trends.
- Strong analytical mindset and experience with reporting, driving insights, and data-driven optimization.
- Ability to adapt in an ever-changing environment - balancing intense attention to detail with swift turnaround while working in a collaborative, positive manner.
- Be dependable, follow instructions and take the initiative to solve problems.
- Creative and a self-starter.
- Experience with Google Analytics, mParticle, Leanplum and SQL is a plus.
- Fluent in Spanish and English.

title: Senior Bilingual English Copywriter
description:
We are Minerva MKT, a company specializing in sponsorship marketing.
We are looking for an experienced copywriter to work alongside our accounts and art director for a foreign client in the context of their MotoGP sponsorship.
We are hoping you will be able to conceptualize the creative approach behind the strategy, to be the mind behind the data!

Requirements:

- Proven experience as a copywriter (+5 years) with a strong portfolio and working with an Art Director.

title: Senior UX Designer

title: VP of Global Communications & PR
description:
At Domestika we are hiring a VP of Global Communications & PR to build, nurture and lead Domestika‚Äôs communications & public relations team. This role is a critical member of the Executive Leadership Team.
You will develop and lead our overall communications strategy, inclusive of public relations, media relations, crisis communications, corporate social responsibility and internal communications. You will work in partnership with the Brand, Programming and Commercial teams to communicate Domestika‚Äôs mission through online and offline channels.
Domestika is one of the largest growing communities within the creative industry. It all started as a small but dynamic showcase of creative professionals, designed to help them connect and learn from each other. Years later, born from this core value, Domestika widened its reach by designing and producing online courses for all those who want to learn and improve professionally with the best teachers. The community has grown to more than 5 million people who are constantly curious and passionate about learning new skills. Domestika has the support of one of the most relevant funds in Silicon Valley.
The team is distributed across 10 countries. This role will begin remote and the final location is flexible based upon the candidate.
What does a VP, Global Communications & PR do at Domestika?
‚Ä¢ Develop and lead our overall communications strategy, inclusive of public relations, media relations, crisis communications, corporate social responsibility & internal communications.
‚Ä¢ Identify the right strategies to drive influence and cultural impact with Domestika‚Äôs key audiences globally.
‚Ä¢ Deliver earned storytelling strategies connected to culture. Pitch media and identify culturally relevant media targets with a large emphasis on digital and social media.
‚Ä¢ Foster strong working relationships with consumer, trade and business media (digital/broadcast/print), in the key markets globally.
‚Ä¢ Lead a robust media relations function, with a focus on delivering exceptional results globally and in market-specific campaigns.
‚Ä¢ Bring forward a rigorous approach and methodology for measuring the impact of PR activities.
‚Ä¢ Build, manage and mentor a high performing internal PR team using a supportive and collaborative approach to growing their capability and championing their work.
‚Ä¢ Work collaboratively with HR and the Executive Team on internal communications designed to bring message cohesion to a fast-growing, multi-lingual, global workforce.
‚Ä¢ Partner with HR on internal and externally facing D&I communication initiatives to ensure that inclusion is considered and integrated.
‚Ä¢ Proactively help the company prepare to manage through an external crisis through the creation of a communications playbook that anticipates and prepares for various scenarios while having a process to effectively marshal resources to react in real-time as situations arise.
Requirements:
‚Ä¢ 15+ years of experience in B2C communications or PR.
‚Ä¢ 10+ years of people leadership, with the demonstrated ability to recruit, develop and retain top talent globally.
‚Ä¢ Experience in a VC-backed, global tech company.
‚Ä¢ Media results that spotlight your ability to deliver outstanding media coverage.
‚Ä¢ Exceptional writer and dynamic speaker.
‚Ä¢ Ability to create compelling, data-driven stories and campaigns that showcase trends.
‚Ä¢ Experience in developing and implementing new communications/positioning strategies in both trade and consumer environments.
‚Ä¢ Fluency in digital media including an understanding of social media, video distribution strategies and SEO.
‚Ä¢ A persuasive influencer who has the ability to build consensus and momentum.
‚Ä¢ Can create clarity and design a game plan with incomplete data and in times of uncertainty.
‚Ä¢ Intimate knowledge of creative, art & design communities as well as the tech & VC space.
‚Ä¢ Comfortable working in an entrepreneurial, fast-paced, growth-focused environment.
‚Ä¢ Native or near-native English in written and oral communications. Fluency in Spanish or other languages is a plus.
What do we offer?
‚Ä¢ Work in one of the fastest growing companies in the creative industry.
‚Ä¢ Great compensation package with a meaningful equity stake.
‚Ä¢ Flexible, remote work environment with the opportunity for global travel (when safe again!)
‚Ä¢ The opportunity to be a key leader in a high-growth company.

title: Product Designer
description:
The Hotels Network is an award-winning technology company providing innovative software (B2B SaaS) for the hospitality industry. Since day one, we've worked hard to bring together an awesome team with deep expertise in hospitality, product design and consumer marketing. United by the mission to help hotel brands increase direct bookings, we build pioneering technology that enables any hotel to optimize their guests‚Äô booking experience and regain their fair share of online revenue. We believe in what we do. As do thousands of hotels around the globe.
Based at our headquarters in Barcelona as well as in other strategic locations around the globe, The Hotels Network team is made up of over 100 people from 25 different nationalities. To fuel our continued rapid growth, we are looking for a Product Designer to join our team based in Barcelona. This is an extraordinary opportunity to join a very ambitious company at a point where your work will have an immediate impact on its growth and results. And have fun doing it, too.
Responsibilities:
-Collaborate with other designers, data scientists, team managers, and engineers to develop innovative and user-friendly products.
-Design new product features, from concept to final design.
-Look for solutions to complex problems.
-Gather feedback from the team, clients, and end-users.
-Be proactive in doing your own research to suggest new ideas and design improvements to current features.
-Map and define the customer journey for current and new products.
-Test new features and ensure consistency in the overall user experience.
Requirements:
-A solid in-depth understanding of user-centred design principles.
-+3 years of experience working as a Product Designer.
-Ability to create low and high-fidelity prototypes.
-Excellent visual design skills.
-Proficiency in Adobe and Sketch.
-Understanding of HTML and CSS principles.
-+3 years of relevant experience, including work with early-stage/new product conceptualization as well as shaping the new version and/or feature enhancements of existing products.
Bonus skills:
-Experience working in a SaaS and the travel sector.
-UI passionate.
-Experience creating and maintaining design systems.
-Experience in user research and testing.
Soft Skills:
-Excellent communication and presentation skills.
-Problem-solving skills.
-Self-starter, high energy and positive attitude
-Ability to multi-task, prioritize, and manage time effectively
-Hands-on attitude and sense of initiative.
-Fun to work with. 
What We Offer:
-International environment with over 25 nationalities.
-Nice office in the Center of Barcelona.
-Have a real impact on a fast-growing innovative technology company.
-Continuous internal and external training.
-Healthy work-life balance with flexible working hours including remote working policies.
-"Flexible compensation plan‚Äù with Ticket Restaurant, Ticket Transport and Bonus for Nursery.
-Competitive compensation.

title: Product Director
description:
At Domestika we are looking for a Product Director.
We are looking for an outstanding / first in class Product Director to help us improve Domestika experience as part of our Product team. The Product Director will have a chance to define the roadmap in order to deliver the best experience to our users.
As a Director, you will take the lead in Product Management and the definition of the Roadmap, shape the best practices and help product teams make that happen.
You will also collaborate with our cross-functional teams, including UX Designers, Product Managers, Front and Back Software Engineers, and Data Scientists, to tackle complex challenges and craft intuitive experiences and new functionalities.
Domestika is one of the largest growing creative communities within the creative industry. It all started as a small but dynamic showcase of creative professionals, designed to help them connect and learn from each other. Years later, born from this core value, Domestika widened its reach by designing and producing online courses for all those who want to learn and improve professionally with the best teachers. The community has grown to more than 5 million people who are constantly curious and passionate about learning new skills.
What does a Director of Product do at Domestika?
‚Ä¢ Responsible for the Roadmap to ensure it is aligned with Domestika‚Äôs priorities.
‚Ä¢ Lead the team towards excellence.
‚Ä¢ Strategic thinking with a very hands-on and proactive approach.
‚Ä¢ Work with the UX Team synergistically to continually raise the bar for the product's design quality.
Requirements:
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of experience as a Director of Product.
‚Ä¢ Expertise with multidisciplinary teams organized in squads.
‚Ä¢ Experience designing roadmaps for native apps, web, and other devices for e-commerce or e-learning products.
‚Ä¢ Experience working in agile delivering high-quality work consistently.
‚Ä¢ Experience leading product design projects.
‚Ä¢ Strong visual skills (use of typography, color, grid systems, etc).
‚Ä¢ Strong communication skills.
‚Ä¢ Fluency in English, Spanish is a plus.
‚Ä¢ Ability to adapt to rapid and fast-moving environments with great flexibility and a can-do + get it done attitude.
‚Ä¢ Win as a team approach.
What do we offer?
‚Ä¢ Working in one of the leading companies in the creative industry.
‚Ä¢ Flexibility to work remotely at all times.
‚Ä¢ A creative, dynamic, exciting, collaborative, and multicultural team.
‚Ä¢ A fast-moving environment in which you can hone your skills, learn along with your colleagues, and grow professionally.
‚Ä¢ Innovative and startup environment with zero politics and a ‚Äúwin as a team‚Äù spirit.

title: Desarrollador iOS
description:
Would you like to play a part into ground breaking technology for large-scale systems, natural language, big data machine learning, and artificial intelligence? 
We are looking for a self-starting, proactive problem solver to join our Software Development Engineering team! 
As part of this team, you will start working in a very exciting project for one of the key players in the technology industry worldwide, performing an engineering role and bringing your expertise in iOS development and provide testing activities as part of innovative projects, which involves artificial intelligence and wearables.
Your main responsibilities would be:
‚Ä¢	Design, build, test and maintain high quality, reusable and reliable Swift code.
‚Ä¢	Take care of the whole software development life cycle, including continuous integration, bug fixing and deployment.
‚Ä¢	Collaborate within a big and cross-functional team to define, design and ship new features.
Skills and experience required:
‚Ä¢	3+ years of experience working in software development projects.
‚Ä¢	Strong coding skills on Swift or similar iOS / Mac related programming languages (Objective-C and C++ are a plus) 
‚Ä¢	Experience using Xcode and Apple developer tools is preferable.
‚Ä¢	Experience with TestFlight and app submission process.
‚Ä¢	Experience developing frameworks and libraries.
‚Ä¢	Experience with CI/CD tools.
‚Ä¢	Experience writing unit tests, with deep knowledge of XCTest and XCUITest suite.
‚Ä¢	Experience defining, writing and passing functional tests.
‚Ä¢	Clear understanding of Object-Oriented Programming and design patterns.
‚Ä¢	Ability to coordinate and lead, with autonomy and proactiveness.
‚Ä¢	Excellent analytical skills and ability to adapt to an environment that drives towards change.
‚Ä¢	Ability to learn new tools, languages and workflows.
‚Ä¢	Fluent in English, with excellent written and spoken communication skills. 
‚Ä¢	Bachelor‚Äôs degree in computer science or related, or equivalent working experience.

title: Post-producer / Colorist (Germany)
description:
At Domestika we are looking for a Post-producer / Colorist.
Your main responsibility will be to attend to the post-production needs of the courses and trailers that are going to be edited ‚Äîproject preparation, transcoding, synchronization, sending to the cloud, resolution of incidents‚Äî and those already edited; that is, apply the knowledge of image retouching as if it were a digital laboratory to shape tasks, increase decorations, add visual effects, do technical retouching, color grade, identify problems, offer technical-artistic solutions, and export the final content in defined formats.
You will be an important part of DOMESTIKA's post-production department in Berlin and you will also attend to the needs of teams from Mexico, Argentina, Chile, Peru, Colombia, Spain, the US, and the UK.
Domestika is one of the largest growing communities within the creative industry. It all started as a small but dynamic showcase of creative professionals, designed to help them connect and learn from each other.
Years later, born from this core value, Domestika widened its reach by designing and producing online courses for anyone who wanted to learn and improve professionally with the best teachers. The community has grown to more than 5 million people who are constantly curious and passionate about learning new skills.
What does the post-producer / colorist do at Domestika?
‚Ä¢ Have the raw filming materials available for transcoding and schedule tasks on the available machines.
‚Ä¢ Organize the assigned courses and prioritize the execution, according to needs and timeline, of the following tasks: invisible VFX, shaping, color and grading, exports, etc.
‚Ä¢ Manage completed courses and their assembly material to proceed with archiving.
‚Ä¢ Ensure the nomenclature and location of materials in published projects, hard drives, server, backup, etc.
‚Ä¢ Share with your team the technical and artistic advances of color for validations, opinions, and approvals, and also to receive help in case of sensory jam.
‚Ä¢ Detect and record extraordinary technical-artistic processes and their solutions, with screenshots, video captures, or texts, to create a documentary fund that can be used if similar situations arise to be solved.
Requirements:
‚Ä¢ You have a native or bilingual level of German.
‚Ä¢ You have an advanced level of English.
‚Ä¢ You have a minimum of 2 years of experience in post-production roles.
‚Ä¢ You have knowledge of color theory, formats, dimensions and metadata, storage, backups, conforming, grading, and editing with professional knowledge of DaVinci Resolve.
‚Ä¢ You have professional knowledge of the Adobe CC Suite, especially Photoshop and After Effects.
‚Ä¢ You have knowledge of export formats, proxies, color spaces, generation and application of LUTs, data depth, disk storage calculation, nomenclatures, media management, archiving, and project recovery.
‚Ä¢ Proactivity to provide improvements, automation, increase in process speed, and implementation of file access security.
‚Ä¢ You have great attention to detail to make the final digital packaging of the courses, ensuring artistic and technical excellence so that students are satisfied.
It is a plus:
‚Ä¢ Management of the Fusion module and programming.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of workflows in the DaVinci collaborative environment.
‚Ä¢ Knowledge of photography, especially in relation to correct exposure, ranges, and log curves, following pre-established lighting schemes.
What do we offer you in exchange?
‚Ä¢ Work in one of the leading companies in the creative industry.
‚Ä¢ A fun, creative, collaborative, and multicultural team.
‚Ä¢ A salary according to your experience and profile.

title: Lead Frontend Web Developer
description:
Sobre la posici√≥n 
Estamos buscando un React Developer para unirse a nuestro equipo de Data Engineer. Los productos de IOMED consisten en un conjunto integrado de herramientas que simplifican dr√°sticamente el proceso de investigaci√≥n cl√≠nica, estructurando los datos cl√≠nicos y proporcionando un acceso unificado y estandarizado a los mismo. Esta funci√≥n implica el desarrollo de nuevas funciones, la resoluci√≥n de problemas, la mejora de la estabilidad y la administraci√≥n de nuestras aplicaciones frontend basadas en React. 
Sobre ti
Buscamos alguien con un m√≠nimo de 2 a√±os de experiencia trabajando con Javascript con el framework React, preferiblemente en un entorno Saas. Aparte de esto, tambi√©n es importante poder:
 - Escribir c√≥digo escalable, mantenible, comprobable y limpio.
 - Tener habilidades demostradas en el desarrollo de software y sentirse c√≥modo siguiendo las mejores 
    pr√°cticas de desarrollo software para crear c√≥digo reutilizable y ampliable. 
 - Estar familiarizado con las metodolog√≠as √°giles y los sistemas de control de versiones (Git). 
 - Escribir c√≥digo limpio y f√°cil de mantener, sentirse c√≥modo con problemas interesantes y con pasi√≥n 
    por crear productos que se utilizar√°n todos los d√≠as. 
 - Consumir REST o GraphQL endpoints. 
Adem√°s, se valorar√°:
 - Tener fuertes habilidades de UX y buen ojo para el dise√±o. 
 - Experiencia en el uso de Figma (u otras herramientas de dise√±o similares). 
 - Experiencia en pruebas unitarias, pruebas funcionales y/o pruebas de integraci√≥n. 
 - Consumir bases de datos relacionales y escribir SQL. 
En cuanto a personalidad, buscamos a alguien que sepa trabajar bien en equipo, que pueda ense√±ar y aprender de los dem√°s, y que mantenga una comunicaci√≥n fluida sobre las tareas que se est√°n realizando con los miembros del equipo t√©cnico y no t√©cnico.
Tareas
Es importante que te sientas c√≥modo adapt√°ndote y apoyando al resto del equipo. Sin embargo, puedes esperar:
 - Dise√±ar y desarrollar aplicaciones usando React / Redux.
 - Desarrollo y mantenimiento del marco principal de front-end.
 - Desarrollar nuevas funciones y componentes para el usuario.
 - Conectar nuestras API de backend en bibliotecas y componentes reutilizables.
 - Respaldar el entorno ya existente, incluida la administraci√≥n, el dise√±o, la documentaci√≥n y la 
    resoluci√≥n de problemas de la infraestructura y c√≥digo.
 - Trabajar en estrecha colaboraci√≥n con los otros desarrolladores y el equipo en un en un entorno 
    Gitlab de desarrollo de software colaborativo
Qu√© ofrecemos
 - Salario anual: 35.000‚Ç¨ - 40.000‚Ç¨. 
 - Contrato indefinido a jornada completa. 
 - Programa de participaci√≥n en los beneficios de la empresa. 
 - Horario flexible, con posibilidad de un d√≠a remoto a la semana. 
 - Un equipo c√°lido, transparente y solidario, que mantiene el equilibrio entre la vida laboral y personal. 
Acerca de IOMED
IOMED es una empresa tecnol√≥gica de nueva creaci√≥n puntera en el campo de la extracci√≥n y el procesamiento masivo de datos m√©dicos. Lo compone un equipo peque√±o, unido, joven, din√°mico y flexible, que, tras varios a√±os de trabajo en conjunto, se caracteriza por su agilidad, disfrute del trabajo y compenetraci√≥n. 
Acorde, buscamos candidatos con ganas de innovar, lanzar un proyecto relevante y crecer con √©l, siempre disfrutando cada d√≠a del trabajo en equipo y de los retos, que son muchos. Nuestro "dream team" est√° formado por estad√≠sticos, bioinform√°ticos, gente del mundo de los negocios y la medicina. 
En IOMED los modelos que desarrolles analizar√°n cientos de millones de textos hospitalarios, ayudando a extraer variables que acelerar√°n la investigaci√≥n cl√≠nica. 
Como empleador, ofrecemos igualdad de oportunidades. Todav√≠a somos un equipo peque√±o y estamos comprometidos a crecer de manera inclusiva. Queremos aumentar nuestro equipo con personas talentosas y din√°micas, independientemente de su raza, color, religi√≥n, nacionalidad, sexo, discapacidad f√≠sica o edad. 
Lo que hacemos 
Hoy en d√≠a, alrededor del 50% de los ensayos cl√≠nicos se retrasan debido al reclutamiento de pacientes, ya que la recopilaci√≥n de datos de pacientes se realiza de forma manual. Como resultado, la investigaci√≥n cl√≠nica es altamente ineficiente tanto en tiempo como en costo, por lo que lleva a√±os y miles de millones de d√≥lares desarrollar un nuevo medicamento. 
Este problema podr√≠a resolverse a trav√©s de datos del mundo real, es decir, aquellos contenidos en las historias cl√≠nicas electr√≥nicas (HCE). Pero desafortunadamente, hasta el 85% de los datos cl√≠nicos existentes no est√°n estructurados, es decir, en texto plano. 
IOMED ha encontrado la soluci√≥n a esta situaci√≥n, haciendo posible aprovechar al m√°ximo el valor de los datos cl√≠nicos del mundo real. Desarrollamos una herramienta que extrae los datos necesarios de los textos cl√≠nicos, lo que da como resultado una base de datos estructurada, estandarizada e interoperable que contiene la informaci√≥n cl√≠nica completa de los hospitales. 
De este modo, la informaci√≥n no reutilizable se transforma en datos disponibles para la Investigaci√≥n cl√≠nica, lo que permite incrementar la cantidad de pacientes que cumplen con los criterios, as√≠ como reducir el tiempo total y el trabajo manual dedicado a esta tarea.

title: SEM Manager
description:
Estamos buscando un SEM Manager con experiencia demostrable en campa√±as de Google Ads y Social Ads. La persona seleccionada se unir√° al equipo de Innova Publicidad en las oficinas de San Vicente del Raspeig (Alicante).
El candidato debe reunir los siguientes requisitos:

title: Especialista en Google Ads

title: Audiovisual Technical Lead
description:
Fever keeps disrupting the way people interact, have fun and get inspired through experiences! Our Fever Originals (Events produced directly by Fever), as well as other projects we do with our partners, increasingly involve audiovisual & multimedia technologies such as motion design, video mapping, VR, and others.
We are looking for a Technical Lead with demonstrated experience working with this type of equipment, from an initial analysis of technical needs of the event and the venue, 3D proposal, lens/distance/power/lux/resolutions calculations and technical schemes, to the implementation on the field. Technical setup, media conversion and operation.
The successful candidate will be involved in international projects and will be responsible for the technical development of these projects, contacting and managing suppliers, deciding which equipment is best suited for each project, and coordinating their implementation. In parallel, he / she will be responsible for managing the budget and optimizing costs and ressource allocation. 
The ideal candidate will have worked in the technical/equipment aspects of the following, with an end-to-end scope:
- Immersive / interactive installations
- Video mapping projection
- Multi Screen Projection setup
- Motion Graphic Installations
- Virtual Reality Animations
Additionally, the successful profile will be:
- Proactive
- Capable of working in international environments (English is a must)
- Execution driven
- Available to travel
This position is to be filled immediately.
ABOUT US
Fever is the leading experience discovery platform, currently present in 20 countries and 100+ cities. We promote all types of experiences in our marketplace, but we also create, promote and distribute our own Fever Originals across the globe, leveraging data from our marketplace and our Secret Media Network to bring the best experiences to people.

title: Product Manager
description:
Job Responsibilities:
        Develops products by identifying potential products; conducting market research; generating product requirements; determining specifications, production timetables, pricing, and time-integrated plans for product introduction; developing marketing strategies.
Job Duties:
- Determines customer needs and desires by performing or directing user feedback sessions
- Recommends the nature and scope of present and future product enhancements
- Assesses market competition by comparing the company's product, actual or envisioned, to competitors' products
- Provides information for management by preparing short-term and long-term product sales forecasts and special reports and analyses; answering questions and requests
- Brings new products to market by analyzing proposed product requirements and product development programs; preparing return-on-investment analyses; establishing time schedules with engineering
- Introduces and markets new products by developing time-integrated plans with sales, advertising, and production
- Determines product pricing by utilizing market research data and reviewing sales costs
- Completes operational requirements by scheduling and assigning employees; following up on work results
- Maintains product management staff by recruiting, selecting, orienting, and training employees
- Maintains product management staff job results by counseling and disciplining employees; planning, monitoring, and appraising job results
- Maintains development backlogs and sets priorities
Product Manager Skills and Qualifications:
- A high level of spoken English (mandatory)
- Strong understanding of UX with ideally a B2C product (mandatory)
- Technical background
- Product Management
- People Management
- Understanding the Customer
- Product Development
- Requirements Analysis
- Pricing
- Planning
- Competitive Analysis
- Sales Planning
- Inventory Control
- Financial Planning
- Strategy

title: Junior Linkbuilder
description:
Life is too short to work for a boring company, so why don‚Äôt you join us? We are looking for a Junior Linkbuilder to join our expanding Communication and SEO team. This position will be responsible for authority building and monitoring our current set of inbound external links as well as for establishing new relationships with third partner sites.
Our ideal white-hat Junior Linkbuilder candidate should have excellent communication skills.
Does that sound like you?
But first, let‚Äôs break the ice!
Who we are & what we do
At Leadtech, we work hard... and play harder! Our mission is to bring forward new business ideas and empower employees to achieve their goals in the online business world.
Since 2009, we have been fostering innovative and creative techniques across many industries, making us pioneers in online project management.
Leadtech is dedicated to constant improvement and inspiring new ideas daily for the world we live in and the future to come.
If you have a creative and innovative mind, Leadtech is looking for you!
Does this still look like your cup of tea? There‚Äôs more
Responsibilities
You‚Äôre our perfect candidate if you:
Monitor the health and performance inbound links pointing to our websites
Monitor third party sites communication strategies and link building efforts.
Find partnership opportunities with third party sites
Write and distribute press releases.
Manage the budget and agreements for the link building campains.
Work with the SEO Manager & Project Managers to research and identify potential link building opportunities , including websites, directories, forums and other interesting sites.
Work closely with third-party writers to ensure that content and link strategies align and complement one another.
Develop and implement white hat link building campaigns
Communication to team and management on project development, timelines, and results
Create weekly and monthly reports of actions and results.
Requirements
Your expertise in a nutshell
Advanced level of English and Spanish (written and spoken).
Strong B2B communicator on the phone, in email and on social media channels.
Basic Marketing knowledge including SEO and Social media strategies.
Multi-task without compromising quality and occasionally assist with other SEO-related tasks.
Self-motivated and have the ability to get things done with little day-to-day direction.
Ownership and pride in your work -- understanding it's importance in company success.
Degree in Communications, Marketing or Business preferred but not required, based on experience.
Experience with basic front-end code (HTML, CSS, JavaScript) .
Interested? Keep on reading!
Benefits
Some of the perks of working with us:
Competitive salary
Full-time, permanent contract
Private health insurance
25 days of holiday + your birthday off
Flexible vacation time (no blackout days)
Flextime (7 - 09.30h / 16 - 18.30h)
Free Friday afternoons (a 7-hour workday!)
35-hour week for the full month of August (free afternoons!)
Flexibility to work from home
Other benefits paid from the gross salary (ticket restaurant, transport tickets, nursery tickets)
Team-building activities
Monthly afterwork
Free coffee and snacks
Free fresh fruit
English courses
Permanent internal training + annual budget for external training
Games room (Nintendo, table tennis, futbol√≠n)
Terrace at the office
An innovative approach to all internal processes and businesses
Work with the latest technologies + career progress opportunities
Equal Employment Opportunity Employer:
Leadtech is an Equal Employment Opportunity (EEO) Employer, which means we encourage applications from people with different backgrounds, interests, and personal circumstances. Our team welcomes applicants regardless of their race, gender, age, religion, nationality, sexual orientation, and/or disabilities. All we need is your high energy, skills, and willingness to be part of a great project!
Hiring process
First step: 15-minute phone interview to get to know you
Second step: Online interview with HR and your future manager to talk about the position and how we approach work. It includes a brief skill assessment test
Third step: HR‚Äôs timely response regarding the status of your application and/or a second interview
Sounds good? Apply now!
We‚Äôre looking forward to meeting you.
Location
You'll have the flexibility to choose whether you'd like to come to the office every day, from time to time, or work fully remote. We want you to find the best combination for you.
If you prefer to be surrounded with amazing people, our exceptional office is in Barcelona‚Äôs Blue Building, located right on the city's seafront. Besides our stunning views, you‚Äôll enjoy our office perks such as free fruit, snacks, and coffee and you‚Äôll also be able to take part in our Mario Kart and table tennis competitions.
The personal data you provide will be processed in order to manage your candidacy for the corporate selection processes that fit your profile. If you wish, you can exercise your rights of access, rectification or cancellation by writing to our address (Avenida del Maresme, 44-46 08918 Badalona) or to the email address protecciondedatos@ Leadtech.com, attaching to your request a document that can validate your identity.

title: User Researcher
description:
THE OPPORTUNITY
We're looking for a User Researcher to help transform research findings into powerful and actionable insights that generate deeper understanding and empathy for our customers among our UX team and the broader organization. If you're a curious person who enjoys exploring new opportunities and is willing to share and collaborate with design and cross-functional peers, we‚Äôd love to meet you!
BaseÔºöMadrid, Spain
JOB DESCRIPTION:
1.	Create a deep understanding and empathy for our customers by planning and executing qualitative and quantitative research across the entire customer journey
2.	Collaborate with our research team in Hangzhou, China and with design and business teams to identify research topics, create research plans and manage a research roadmap 
3.	Plan and design user research, from designing samples and screeners to identifying methods to achieve research goals
4.	Execute the research, including leading multidisciplinary teams in the field and using a variety of methods such as in-depth interviews, surveys, field research, diary studies, usability testing (remote and in-person), etc 
5.	Analyze quantitative and qualitative data, synthesize learnings into actionable insights and design principles and identify systems-level patterns and frameworks 
6.	Participate in product decisions from definition to launch (and after), working at both a strategic and tactical level 
JOB REQUIREMENTS:
1.	Fluent in both English and Spanish;
2.	Psychology, anthropology, sociology, statistics, information science, human-computer interaction, cognitive science or related background, with more than three years of relevant experience in user research;
3.	Have practical experience in integrating user research insights into business strategy and product design;
4.	End-to-end experience with all aspects of research (study design, recruiting, moderation, analysis, storytelling, post-launch metrics collection);
5.	Excellent communication, presentation, social and analytical skills; the ability to communicate complex concepts clearly and persuasively across different audiences and varying levels of the organization
6.	Experience working in highly collaborative design teams, or other multidisciplinary teams that include product managers, operators and developers

title: Global CRM Director
description:
At Domestika we‚Äôre looking for a Global CRM Director.
Domestika is one of the largest growing communities within the creative industry. It all started as a small but dynamic showcase of creative professionals, designed to help them connect and learn from each other. Years later, born from this core value, Domestika widened its reach by designing and producing online courses for all those who want to learn and improve professionally with the best teachers. The community has grown to more than 5 million people who are constantly curious and passionate about learning new skills. The company is based in San Francisco, California. The team is distributed in 9 countries. Domestika has the support of one of the most relevant funds in Silicon Valley (USA).
What does a Global CRM Director do at Domestika?
As the Global CRM Director, you will take the lead of the CRM team focused on Strategy, data and planning. Your mandate will be to substantially impact recurrent retention and loyalty users while opening new markets, languages and geographies. The existing team is overwhelmingly concentrated in Barcelona but both this role and future team members will be on a remote setup.
Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Defining co-owned goals, objectives, KPIs, and creating reporting across our customer base.
‚Ä¢ Managing a team and developing them further to enhance end-to-end marketing campaigns, including concepting, creative, onboarding, triggered, transactional, and ad-hoc campaigns.
‚Ä¢ Overseeing and refining the engagement strategy, managing communication engagement capabilities.
‚Ä¢ Developing a rigorous testing strategy (A/B and multivariate tests) alongside the team to continually optimize all areas of the program, understand our customer segments and their behaviors through the email channel.
‚Ä¢ Building new programs and initiatives with other channels.
‚Ä¢ Undertaking a thorough customer journey mapping initiative and working with Digital Acquisition, Website, Product, and UX teams to identify, understand and optimize key customer segments and layer on lifecycle marketing opportunities, LTV analysis, and experimentation with emerging technologies.
‚Ä¢ Overseeing and partnering with Data Team to perform customer segmentation analytics (behavioral, attitudinal, demographic) and formulate a segmentation strategy within the current customer base.
‚Ä¢ Identifying trends in targeted marketing and CRM strategies to glean insights on best practices and new innovative ideas around how we nurture and retain customers.
‚Ä¢ Partnering with Data and Product teams to develop personalization across channels to drive sales and engagement while influencing longer-term customer behavior.
Requirements:
‚Ä¢ 10+ years of experience in a similar position.
‚Ä¢ Experience across areas including email, CRM, loyalty/rewards, push, direct mail, customer segmentation, product marketing, and promotions.
‚Ä¢ Experience working in, and understanding the dynamics of consumer e-commerce. Expert knowledge of email marketing / CRM, CMS and reporting tools. Knowledge of Iterable, Amplitude, Custora is a plus.
‚Ä¢ An exceptional track record of developing profitable retention marketing programs and meeting and exceeding performance & revenue.
‚Ä¢ Excellent communication skills and proven ability to manage stakeholders in Product&Data teams to achieve common goals and expand CRM‚Äôs impact across departments.
‚Ä¢ Strong leadership skills with a proven ability to manage, mentor, and develop high-performing and highly engaged teams.
‚Ä¢ An entrepreneurial spirit, be highly motivated and ability to work independently, while also able to build strong internal relationships and build consensus on critical initiatives.
‚Ä¢ Ability to operate in a fast-paced environment, managing multiple projects simultaneously and prioritizing time and resources based on business impact.
‚Ä¢ Passion for delighting and advocating for customers and an intimate understanding of how and when to influence customer behavior.
‚Ä¢ Bachelor‚Äôs Degree; Master‚Äôs degree a plus.
What do we offer?
‚Ä¢ Working in one of the leading companies in the creative industry.
‚Ä¢ A creative, dynamic, exciting, collaborative, and multicultural team.
‚Ä¢ Fast-moving environment in which you can hone your skills, learn along with your colleagues, and grow professionally.
‚Ä¢ A salary according to your experience and profile.

title: SEO Consultant
description:
Estamos buscando una persona apasionada con experiencia SEO ya sea con proyectos propios, agencia o empresa final, para incorporarse como Consultor SEO.
¬øQuieres saber m√°s? ¬°Te contamos!
En Rodanet llevamos desde 2011 ofreciendo servicios de marketing online y especializ√°ndonos como agencia SEO. Con una una cartera de clientes de todo tipo (grandes empresas, multinacionales, e-commerce, negocios locales y mucho m√°s) dentro de los sectores m√°s competidos de Internet.
Contamos con un equipo de 12 personas especializadas 100% en SEO, y expertos de las diversas √°reas de marketing online para complementar las estrategias de nuestros clientes (redactores, PPC Specialist, programaci√≥n y maquetaci√≥n).
¬øCu√°l ser√° tu misi√≥n en el d√≠a a d√≠a?
- Gesti√≥n de cartera propia de clientes SEO
- Auditar las webs de los proyectos definiendo toda la estrategia SEO y aspectos t√©cnicos de las webs.
- Seguimiento de la estrategia mensual de los proyectos: linkbuilding, definici√≥n de estrategias, an√°lisis de acciones y progresi√≥n y hojas de ruta para hacer crecer el negocio del cliente.
- Llevar a cabo toda la comunicaci√≥n con el cliente, tanto de seguimiento como a nivel de resultados y did√°ctico.
- Gesti√≥n y seguimiento de todos los procesos internos con diferentes herramientas (Google Drive, Sheets, Docs,Trello, etc.) donde aprender√°s toda la sistematizaci√≥n y automatizaci√≥n de procesos en una agencia.
Para ello, deber√≠as conocer las principales herramientas que utilizamos del sector:
¬∑ Ahrefs
¬∑ Screaming Frog
¬∑ Google Sheets/Excel
¬∑ Google Tag Manager / Data Studio
¬∑ Google Search Console y Analytics
¬∑ Wordpress
No es imprescindible, pero valoraremos:

- Conocimientos de HTML, CSS y/o PHP.
- Experiencia en CMS como Prestashop o Magento.

title: React Developer
description:
En IOMED estamos buscando un React Developer para unirse a nuestro equipo de Data Engineer. Los productos de IOMED consisten en un conjunto integrado de herramientas que simplifican dr√°sticamente el proceso de investigaci√≥n cl√≠nica, estructurando los datos cl√≠nicos y proporcionando un acceso unificado y estandarizado a los mismo. Esta funci√≥n implica el desarrollo de nuevas funciones, la resoluci√≥n de problemas, la mejora de la estabilidad y la administraci√≥n de nuestras aplicaciones frontend basadas en React. 
Sobre ti: 
Buscamos alguien con un m√≠nimo de 2 a√±os de experiencia trabajando con Javascript con el framework React, preferiblemente en un entorno Saas. Aparte de esto, tambi√©n es importante poder:
  -  Escribir c√≥digo escalable, mantenible, comprobable y limpio.
  -  Tener habilidades demostradas en el desarrollo de software y sentirse c√≥modo siguiendo las 
      mejores pr√°cticas de desarrollo software para crear c√≥digo reutilizable y ampliable. 
  -  Estar familiarizado con las metodolog√≠as √°giles y los sistemas de control de versiones (Git). 
  -  Escribir c√≥digo limpio y f√°cil de mantener, sentirse c√≥modo con problemas interesantes y con pasi√≥n 
      por crear productos que se utilizar√°n todos los d√≠as. 
  -  Consumir REST o GraphQL endpoints. 
Adem√°s, se valorar√°:
  -  Tener fuertes habilidades de UX y buen ojo para el dise√±o. 
  -  Experiencia en el uso de Figma (u otras herramientas de dise√±o similares). 
  -  Experiencia en pruebas unitarias, pruebas funcionales y/o pruebas de integraci√≥n. 
  -  Consumir bases de datos relacionales y escribir SQL. 
En cuanto a personalidad, buscamos a alguien que sepa trabajar bien en equipo, que pueda ense√±ar y aprender de los dem√°s, y que mantenga una comunicaci√≥n fluida sobre las tareas que se est√°n realizando con los miembros del equipo t√©cnico y no t√©cnico.
Tareas:
Es importante que te sientas c√≥modo adapt√°ndote y apoyando al resto del equipo. Sin embargo, puedes esperar:
  -  Dise√±ar y desarrollar aplicaciones usando React / Redux.
  -  Desarrollo y mantenimiento del marco principal de front-end.
  -  Desarrollar nuevas funciones y componentes para el usuario.
  -  Conectar nuestras API de backend en bibliotecas y componentes reutilizables.
  -  Respaldar el entorno ya existente, incluida la administraci√≥n, el dise√±o, la documentaci√≥n y la 
      resoluci√≥n de problemas de la infraestructura y c√≥digo.
  -  Trabajar en estrecha colaboraci√≥n con los otros desarrolladores y el equipo en un en un entorno 
      Gitlab de desarrollo de software colaborativo
Qu√© ofrecemos:
  -  Salario anual: 35.000‚Ç¨. 
  -  Contrato indefinido a jornada completa. 
  -  Programa de participaci√≥n en los beneficios de la empresa. 
  -  Horario flexible, con posibilidad de un d√≠a remoto a la semana. 
  -  Un equipo c√°lido, transparente y solidario, que mantiene el equilibrio entre la vida laboral y personal. 
Acerca de IOMED: 
IOMED es una empresa tecnol√≥gica de nueva creaci√≥n puntera en el campo de la extracci√≥n y el procesamiento masivo de datos m√©dicos. Lo compone un equipo peque√±o, unido, joven, din√°mico y flexible, que, tras varios a√±os de trabajo en conjunto, se caracteriza por su agilidad, disfrute del trabajo y compenetraci√≥n. 
Acorde, buscamos candidatos con ganas de innovar, lanzar un proyecto relevante y crecer con √©l, siempre disfrutando cada d√≠a del trabajo en equipo y de los retos, que son muchos. Nuestro "dream team" est√° formado por estad√≠sticos, bioinform√°ticos, gente del mundo de los negocios y la medicina. 
En IOMED los modelos que desarrolles analizar√°n cientos de millones de textos hospitalarios, ayudando a extraer variables que acelerar√°n la investigaci√≥n cl√≠nica. 
Como empleador, ofrecemos igualdad de oportunidades. Todav√≠a somos un equipo peque√±o y estamos comprometidos a crecer de manera inclusiva. Queremos aumentar nuestro equipo con personas talentosas y din√°micas, independientemente de su raza, color, religi√≥n, nacionalidad, sexo, discapacidad f√≠sica o edad. 
Lo que hacemos:
Hoy en d√≠a, alrededor del 50% de los ensayos cl√≠nicos se retrasan debido al reclutamiento de pacientes, ya que la recopilaci√≥n de datos de pacientes se realiza de forma manual. Como resultado, la investigaci√≥n cl√≠nica es altamente ineficiente tanto en tiempo como en costo, por lo que lleva a√±os y miles de millones de d√≥lares desarrollar un nuevo medicamento. 
Este problema podr√≠a resolverse a trav√©s de datos del mundo real, es decir, aquellos contenidos en las historias cl√≠nicas electr√≥nicas (HCE). Pero desafortunadamente, hasta el 85% de los datos cl√≠nicos existentes no est√°n estructurados, es decir, en texto plano. 
IOMED ha encontrado la soluci√≥n a esta situaci√≥n, haciendo posible aprovechar al m√°ximo el valor de los datos cl√≠nicos del mundo real. Desarrollamos una herramienta que extrae los datos necesarios de los textos cl√≠nicos, lo que da como resultado una base de datos estructurada, estandarizada e interoperable que contiene la informaci√≥n cl√≠nica completa de los hospitales. 
De este modo, la informaci√≥n no reutilizable se transforma en datos disponibles para la Investigaci√≥n cl√≠nica, lo que permite incrementar la cantidad de pacientes que cumplen con los criterios, as√≠ como reducir el tiempo total y el trabajo manual dedicado a esta tarea.

title: UX/UI Digital Designer
description:
Company Description
ESL Languages is the leading European study abroad agency. We have been organising language courses abroad throughout the world since 1996. Our presence is international, with more than 40 sales offices across Europe.
Beyond linguistic, cultural and geographical borders, more than 25 thousand students every year make the choice to book with ESL and make their goal of learning a language and discovering the world a reality.
ESL received many industry accolades over the years. We entered into the eternal Hall of Fame as Best European Study Abroad Agency in Europe in 2016 after winning 5 times in 6 consecutive years. This prestigious ST award is based on the votes of thousands of language schools around the world and rewards the quality counseling and high service provided by all of the ESL staff.
In 2019, ESL became part of the Kaplan Languages Group, one of the largest global chains of English language schools. ESL continues to work an independent agency within the KLG group.
Job Description
We are looking for a creative and motivated designer with digital design experience and a customer-oriented approach to join our in-house design team. Working as part of the Marketing department, and reporting directly to the Design Manager, you will be in charge of the UX/UI improvements of our website and give support with the delivery of cross-channel marketing materials intended for online use, working closely with other departments teams to create and bring ideas to life.
Responsibilities
    Key player within ESL website development to help achieving the objectives, while assuming the lead of the UX/UI track and working closely with the rest of the project track leaders (Research&Analytics, Content, SEO, Web)
    Contribute to user&data research and insights, wireframing, testing and provide UI design suggestions for our website
    Collaborate with developers to ensure the correct front-end implementation
    While the focus is mainly on digital, support for other online and offline-related projects might be required (e.g.: visual content for Social Media, online marketing assets, brochures, flyers and other corporate materials‚Ä¶)
    Respond with quality design solutions, meet deadlines and iterate when necessary based on clear and detailed briefings received from the different areas and the directions and supervision from the Design Manager
Qualifications
    A bachelor‚Äôs degree or equivalent
    Minimum of 3 years of UX/UI work experience and a portfolio that reflects it
    Experience in collaborative projects with other designers and developers
    Competent with Adobe Creative Cloud (XD, Photoshop, Illustrator‚Ä¶), Sketch and Figma
    Knowledge of fundamental UX principles and UI guidelines. Knowledge of agile methodologies will be a plus
    Basic knowledge of CSS/HTML
    Video edition skills (Adobe Premiere; After Effects) will be valued
    Experience within agile methodologies and tools related (Confluence, Jira‚Ä¶)
    Ability to work in a very structured way, accurately and consistenly
    Very collaborative team oriented person, positive, proactive and with a ‚Äòcan do‚Äô mentality
    Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English. Other languages will be a plus
Additional Information
What We Offer You:
    The opportunity to develop your skills in an international environment, in the exciting field of language travel
    A dynamic work atmosphere
    Competitive salary + Ticket restaurant
    Place of work: Barcelona (Spain)
    Start date: ASAP
    Reference: ESL_UX
    Type of contract: Permanent
    Activity rate: Full time

title: Game Artist
description:
Here‚Äôs an opportunity for an experienced game artist to join a team of seasoned games makers and their recently funded start-up. 
We have raised capital from the ‚Äúwho is who‚Äù of early stage gaming investors. 
Our first game blends a casual/puzzle experience with a light metagame (think merging-puzzle meets Homescapes meta) and has been initially validated by upper percentile early retention and engagement metrics.
We now offer an opportunity for a 2D Game Artist/Illustrator to help us create the visuals of this brand new game. Among your responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Create amazing and consistent 2D characters, backgrounds and props from the first concept to the final asset ready for implementation.
‚Ä¢ Build the world of the game keeping technical and artistic requirements in mind.
‚Ä¢ Understand and empathize with the audience to create art they love.
‚Ä¢ Work collaboratively with all members of the team.
Our company offers a choice between fully remote engagement in the ‚ÄúCET +/- 1hour‚Äù  time zones as well as employment at their new Berlin base.
About you:
This would be the right role for you if you... 
‚Ä¢ want to make games that bring perpetual entertainment to players around the world.
‚Ä¢ are a humble team player with strong curiosity in others‚Äô views.
‚Ä¢ have ~ 4 years of relevant experience in the videogames industry.
‚Ä¢ gathered strong demonstrable artistic knowledge (line, shape, composition, light, color, rendering‚Ä¶).
‚Ä¢ have a deep understanding of design, including architectural elements and props.
‚Ä¢ gained experience creating isometric worlds and are familiar with tiling processes.
‚Ä¢ enjoy learning new tools. Basics of Unity would be an additional super power.

More about us:
We create mobile games that are incredibly fun and can be enjoyed by players for a very very long time. We approach development as ‚Äúdata driven artists‚Äù who believe that an idea is only good if it works for the players. That‚Äôs why we develop in rapid iterative phases, being both passionate and data driven.

We have previously worked for renowned companies (Wooga, King, Wargaming, Good Games and Peak among others). We have shipped and worked on games that have generated hundreds of millions of euros, including a top 50 grossing game that our co-founder led from inception to release. We also have a couple of failures under our belt which qualify us even further for success. 
Our games blend casual and midcore gameplay mechanics and will be supported with strong social layers, aiming to define a whole new category of perpetual games.

We have secured investment from some of the most iconic games entrepreneurs including Victor Kislyi, Founder & CEO Wargaming and Sami Lababidi, serial entrepreneur, co-founder & CTO Playfish, and others as well the leading early stage institutional investors Creandum (Spotify, Klarna, iZettle, Small Giant Games) and Initial Capital (Supercell, Space Ape Games).
We have a solid runway with sufficient capital to pay required contractors, test user acquisition, etc.  Things are going well, our first game delivers convincing metrics and we are pushing hard but carefully towards a full release.
What else:

You will join a small interdisciplinary team of seven very experienced game professionals covering all aspects of art, engineering, data analysis as well as company leadership.
This is a permanent full-time contract. We offer competitive salaries, confirming that they can accommodate exceptional candidates, and as an early stage employee you could benefit from the equity package that would get allocated after passing a trial period.

We also provide visa sponsorship and full relocation assistance if required.
We are committed to providing a friendly, safe and welcoming environment for everyone who works here or with us, regardless of gender, gender identity and expression, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, age, religion (or lack thereof) and game preferences.
