title: Product Designer UX/UI
description:
Company:
Coverfy is a disruptive insurtech startup on a mission to make insurance easy for everyone.
Based in Barcelona and founded in 2016, we are a growing team of 40+ passionate people. Our app has been already downloaded by 100.000+ users in Spain, helping them to manage their personal insurance needs, optimise their prices and coverages automatically and get free and professional advise on-demand.
We are now also helping insurance companies, banks and brokers to deliver an outstanding user experience to their clients.
About this role:
We are currently looking for a Product Designer to join us. The position will be focused on helping the Product Team to create an outstanding user experience and interface through our cross-platform app (iOS, Android, WebApp) and Back-End.
What will you do at Coverfy as a Product Designer (UX/UI)?:
*Craft every detail of new product features, from idea to pixel-perfect execution.
*Partner closely with our Product team to understand what users need, want, and love about our products.
*Create design systems that are simple to understand but help us to move faster as we scale.
*Work with marketing to devise new ways to tell great stories throughout the user lifecycle, and across our site, product, help guides and other channels.
This might be for you if...:
*You have at least 3+ years of experience designing web and mobile apps.
*You can create pixel-perfect visual designs (UI).
*You can untangle hard conceptual problems and have sharp intuition on how people use products (UX).
*You love working in a team and often discuss about how to make our product better.
*You have wide experience working with wireframing and prototyping.
*You are comfortable participating in all UX phases (research, understanding, definition, design, iteration, testing, implementation).
Nice to have:
*HTML & CSS proficiency. Part of our products require creating and optimizing responsive emails or web pages.
*Interested in data and analytics.
*Experience working with agile methodologies (Scrum, Kanban) and collaboration tools (JIRA, Confluence).
What we offer:
*Taking part of one of the startups with the greatest projection on the European Insurtech map.
*Full time contract with a flexible schedule.
*Professional development and growth opportunities.
*Interesting discounts in insurance products.
*Young and dynamic work environment, where a good and fun atmosphere is guaranteed.

description:

As a Web developer, you will be responsible for building and managing the development lifecycle of these tools, coordinating with technical and business teams to create, refine and grow these systems.

title: App Business Analyst
description:
Yoga Solo is an umbrella brand that started 4 years ago with a yoga app. We‚Äôre currently looking to expand to other products in the fitness and wellbeing sphere and are looking for a business analyst based in Barcelona to help us do so.
By careful and creative analysis of potential business opportunities, you will help us evaluate opportunities and bring our product portfolio to the next level. In this position, you would have the opportunity to help us create and give shape to a suite of yoga, fitness, pilates and meditation apps among others.
Above all, we are looking for a highly competent professional with an analytical mindset and experience with building strategy for digital products. As well as being able to produce credible ROI analysis when datasets are very limited, this person should have excellent presentation and data storytelling skills.
In addition, we‚Äôre looking for a strong team player who knows that factors as well as numbers have strategic importance and is able to be pragmatic when it comes to research and recommendations.
Tasks:

- Set KPIs for new products and features, define and execute follow-up plan
- Help build the organisation‚Äôs roadmap in a way that maximises value over time

Knowledge/experience:

- French language speaking
Also valued:

- Knowledge of data visualisation tools (Tableau, Data Studio, etc.)
Must have a permit to work in Spain.

title: Senior Social Media Manager
description:
We are looking for a new talented and enthusiastic Senior Social Media Manager. You will be the person responsible for building, managing, and administering the online community around the brand, creating and maintaining stable and lasting relationships with its customers and, in general, any user interested in the company.
Your main responsibility will be to manage our social networks; creating relevant content and taking care of the constant growth of the network community. Also, as a Senior Social Media Manager, you must be proactive in generating content proposals that help improve the performance of different profiles, based on constant analysis of the performance of the channels.
You will work side by side with different areas within Marketing, participating in the creation of communication content.

START DATE
Immediate incorporation
 
MAIN RESPONSIBILITIES
You will be the voice of Ostrichpillow in social networks. You will know the brand thoroughly and be able to express our values coherently and consistently in the different channels. 
Create content and manage Ostrichpillow social media channels to care and improve the reach of our organic content. 
Propose actions to generate engagement by followers on social media. 
Identify and manage relationships with influencers 
Measure the day-to-day performance of different channels and conclude to improve it and make our presence in these channels increasingly relevant. 
Monitor the different data sources and improve the performance according to the established KPIs
MUST HAVE
4 years or more of experience managing social networks in e-commerce with large audiences and with a focus on conversion. 
Professionally proficient in English. Valuable high level of Spanish or other languages.
Open, curious, energetic, and focused. Team-working soft skills. We are looking for a senior professional with the right attitude, who matches the values of the brand.   
Exceptional communications and editorial skills: able to assume the tone of voice of the brand and express it coherently on our social media channels. 
Used to remote working

NICE TO HAVE
Facebook Ads Certification, Google AdWords Certifications (search, and display), Google Analytics Certification.
Examples of campaigns carried out on Facebook and Instagram
Experience in Public Relations and Influencers marketing would be a valuable bonus.
Organizational and planning skills. 
Knowledge of digital marketing tools such as MailChimp, Shopify, and Google Analytics.

title: Digital Product Designer
description:
Emjoy is a sexual wellbeing audio app for women. We're a female-founded tech company encouraging over 100.000 users to explore their bodies and tap into their sexuality with guided practices designed by our in-house sex therapist and experts from different fields. In addition, we also offer sexy stories for our audience to get in the mood. Our mission is to raise women's confidence by bringing awareness and understanding of their needs. 

Emjoy is available worldwide for iOS and Android since January 2020.üì±

We are a VC backed, fully funded startup. This gives you the security you‚Äôd find in a larger company with the speed, experimentation and fun of an early-stage startup. We‚Äôre an international team of 11 people based in Barcelona.
About yourself
As a UX/UI Designer at Emjoy, together with the rest of the team, you will guide and implement the experience, visual language and overall look and feel of our mobile app and website, based on design objectives and product requirements. You will work with different teams and stakeholders to come up with intuitive user experiences and killer user interfaces in order to create a compelling visual experience for our users.
Be a part of a team where you will:
- Have a clear overview of our product roadmap and business KPIs.
- Create user flows and journeys, concept sketches, prototypes, and wireframes.
- Contribute to the development of our Design System.
- Collaborate with developers to make sure that your visual designs are translated perfectly when coded.
- Bring data into your decision making and rationale.
- Translate high-level requirements into interaction flows and artifacts, and transforming them into useful, intuitive, and functional designs.
- Be part of our lean and data-driven product development process by doing A/B tests and MVPs before a new feature is fully rolled out.
- Work closely with Product, Product Marketing, and Data to develop product requirements, creating and validating solutions.
- Support our Marketing team with landings, CRM campaigns, or ads for social media and networks.

You have:
- 2+ years of experience in mobile apps design.
- 1+ years of experience as a visual designer in a Marketing/Growth environment working with landings, social media, or email campaigns.
- A strong portfolio is a must; show us you know how to create an experience.
- Expertise with design tools such as Sketch, Invision, and Adobe Creative Suite.
- Proven ability to interact with stakeholders, manage expectations, and accept constructive criticism of your work.
- Good English is a must.
- Graphic animation (Principle, After Effects, ) will be a plus.
- Illustration skills will be a plus.

What We Offer:
- A chance to improve the lives of millions of women worldwide.
- A great learning curve is guaranteed by helping us build a category-defining product that our users love.
- This is a great opportunity to work closely with a lively, diverse and high caliber team in a fast-paced and high growth environment.
- Coffee, fruits and goodies are on us.
- Great office location at the heart of Barcelona, easy access!
- Possibility of working remotely.
- Competitive salary.

title: Performance Marketer
description:
¬øQui√©nes somos?
UNANIME CREATIVOS es una agencia de marketing 360¬∫ en Valencia. 
¬øQu√© estamos buscando?
Estamos buscando una persona que se una al equipo de especialisttas de marketing y que implemente la estrategia de marketing de resultados de nuestros clientes. Un especialista en: SEM y social Ads, con visi√≥n anal√≠tica y orientado a resultados.
Principales funciones:
- Gesti√≥n de cuentas PPC y paid media (Google Ads y Social Ads).
- Implementtar la estrategia SEM con Google Ads, Facebook Ads, Instagram Ads, etc. Dise√±o de anuncios y campa√±as. Control de resultados y an√°lisis de objetivos.
- Gesti√≥n de plataforma Google Ads (Search, Shopping, Display and Video)
- Estrategias de Remarketing
- Social Ads (Facebook + Instagram Ads, linkedin Ads)
- Monitorizar el CTR, mejoras y optimizaci√≥n del CPC y estrategias CRO.
- Manejar adecuadamente las herramientas SEM y anal√≠tica como SEMrush, Google Analytics, Facebook Analytics, Google Optimize, Data Studio, etc
- Medir e implantar en tracking en las p√°ginas web para analizar la consecuci√≥n de objetivos. Por lo que ser√° necesario conocer herramientas como: Google Tag Manager
- Identificar e implementar estrategias para incrementar el tr√°fico al site a trav√©s de posicionamiento org√°nico.
- Analizar e investigar los keyword research.
- Analizar la competencia de forma peri√≥dica.
- Estudiar las posibles penalizaciones.
- Marketing Automation
-... y todo aquello que consideres interesante para nuestros clientes. Queremos escucharte y que lideres el √°rea :)
¬øQu√© candidato/a buscamos?
Buscamos un especialista en Marketing de Resultados (Social Ads y SEM), una persona con la experiencia suficiente para ser independiente en la toma de decisiones sobre las estrategias a seguir y con ideas creativas que ayuden a mejorar los resultados de los clientes y de las distintas campa√±as online.
Experiencia en an√°lisis de datos KPI¬¥s y en la creaci√≥n de campa√±as online en Google Adwords y Social Ads que lleven a la conversi√≥n. Campa√±as de Inbound y Remarketing y realizar el control exhaustivo y la optimizaci√≥n del presupuesto para maximizar el ROI.
Buscamos un perfil que se sienta identificado con la agencia y que tenga en su ADN valores tan importantes para nosotros como el compa√±erismo, compromiso, lealtad, entusiasmo y profesionalidad.
Queremos una persona que sea proactiva y que no tenga miedo a tener iniciativa en las distintas campa√±as a realizar, que tenga alta capacidad de an√°lisis y orientaci√≥n a resultados.
Requisitos:
- Experiencia demostrable en posici√≥n similar, m√≠nima de 2-5 a√±os en PPC.
- Persona con excelentes habilidades para el an√°lisis y la gesti√≥n de campa√±as.
- Dominio de Excel.
- Dominio de herramientas de monitorizaci√≥n p.ej. (SEM Rush).
- Conocimientos avanzados de Google Ads, Social Ads (Facebook Ads, Instagram Ads, LinkedIn Ads), Google Analytics y Tag Manager.
- Formaci√≥n: SEM, Anal√≠tica Web, Marketing Digital, Publicidad, Comunicaci√≥n Audiovisual, AD, Ingenier√≠a, Estad√≠stica, Matem√°tico/a... realmente lo que m√°s nos importa es que tengas los conocimientos y la experiencia para poder desarrollar las funciones descritas... y que seas una excelente persona ;)
Se valorar√° (importante):
- Certificaciones en Google Ads (b√∫squeda, display, mobile y Shopping) y Certificaci√≥n en Google Analytics.
- Ejemplos de campa√±as realizadas y resultados en SEM y social ads.
- Que seas un perfil anal√≠tico, con atenci√≥n a los detalles y actitud proactiva.
- Experiencia en Wordpress
Y si adem√°s (no es imprescindible):
- Tienes conocimientos en HTML y CSS
- Si saber moverte con soltura en conceptos como AMP y Datos Estructurados.
- Conocimiento de dise√±o gr√°fico y uso de herramientas (Illustrator, Photoshop) a nivel b√°sico
- Conocimientos en Marketing de Automatizaci√≥n
¬øQu√© ofrecemos?
Contrato 6 meses + indefinido.
Jornada laboral de L-J de 9:00 a 18:00, V de 9:00 a 15:00 (jornada intensiva en verano)
Proyecto ilusionante y en constante crecimiento.

title: Junior Cloud Engineer
description:
ABOUT GOXO
We are a food tech startup born in Madrid in 2017. We provide restaurants with a full solution to take orders online (app & web) across all channels (delivery, takeaway, in-restaurant) in a fast (ready in 24h) and cost efficient (savings of 40-70% vs. marketplaces) way while owning customer relationships (data, loyalty). 
Our vision is to make technology available to any restaurant so they can adapt their business to the new digital era, with the aim to maintain the highest-quality food offering in the city.

YOUR OPPORTUNITY
We are looking for a Junior Cloud Engineer to help us  take our products to the next level, creating solid, scalable, cost-effective, 12-factor based code, and amazing restaurant experiences using APIs.
The Goxo stack uses mainly the following technologies: React Native, React JS, Express, Node.JS y MongoDB. We have a set of products aiming at making the restaurant business digitization seamless.

YOUR JOB
You will start configuring and deploying our app for new clients under the tutelage of a senior engineer. This will help you understand the steps to produce each application.
As you grow in your knowledge of the configuration and build process you will be able to improve this process and automate it to build a continuous integration and continuous deployment pipeline
You will also be able to analyse the architecture, and together with the senior engineer be able to improve the codebase to make it reliable and scalable.
Manage and maintain the Goxo backend so that it grows smoothly and maintainably.
Ensure developments and deployments quality assurance.
Re-scaffold and refactor, sometimes throw away and start from scratch, previously developed modules.
Maintain the Goxo codebase clean.
Provide support to the operations team by  resolving technical issues and build utilities together with the devops team  to help them tackle the daily operations.
Help other team developers grow in software craftsmanship.

YOUR IDEAL PROFILE
You will be joining the GOXO team as a Junior Cloud Engineer (Full-stack Ninja), so fasten your seatbelt because we want you to grow on the following technologies:
We are looking for an avid learner, someone who thrives in finding new challenges and growing to overcome them. We don‚Äôt expect you to be an expert, but we need you to be able to learn and improve continuously.
You will have to grow in the following technology stack:
Scripting  skills in python, golang or shellscripting.
React.js (Redux, Sagas, Recompose, Reselect)., Handlebars JS
RESTful APIs / Swagger (Open API) / Microservices.
TDD development and quality assurance (Mocha, Jest or similar)
Object-Oriented Design Principles.	
Create multiple backends and APIs, and deploy in containerized environments.
Integrate with API Clients for Facebook, Instagram, Apple, Stripe and other third party services.
Devops culture, setting software development Life Cycle, specifically CI/CD such as Travis, CircleCI or Jenkins.
Linux (Debian based), Git, Redis, Postfix, Nginx, Load Balancer, Google Cloud.
Passion for well-crafted and scalable code.
Entrepreneurial, independent, loves working on new ideas.
Love for food.

YOUR LIFE AT GOXO

You will be joining a great group of people with the common goal to change the restaurant business with technology and data. We‚Äôve been resident at Google for Startups Campus in Madrid as members of Tetuan Valley community, and we‚Äôre now entering a new growth phase and building a larger team to succeed as the spanish market leader in ordering platforms for restaurants.
We will offer you an attractive salary package according to your experience and fit to the role. We also give you an opportunity to write history with us and become part of a fast growing company who is changing the restaurant business.

description:

title: Marketing & Comunicaci√≥n - Pr√°cticas
description:
The startup:
Sharify is a digital Startup based in Barcelona which goal is create a real-time map that connects Smart Cities with their citizens. Designed as a Social Network, Sharify lets people discover and share what's happening right here and right now around. Where the art exhibitions are, which concerts are going on in each neighborhood, people up to run, play the guitar or visit a museum together, etc. Everything in just three clicks: what, when and where, creating the first open-data map that lets people share and discover what is happening right now around.
The role:
The Marketing & Community Intern will be responsible and help on the social media strategy, blog content and SEO strategy to maximize the acquisition and retention of Sharify users, and public relations too. We are looking for someone with a clear vision of optimization strategies, analytical but also innovative to help on Sharify's online and offline communication with a fresh way of thinking that challenges and grows our business.

title: Head of CRM
description:
Marathonbet Spain team keeps growing and, therefore, we are looking for a Head of CRM to join our team, in Zaragoza.
What are we looking for? Please check below:
Purpose of the Role: 
To design, develop, and deliver the Group's overall Customer Relationship Management Strategy. to use data to inform player based investment, driving down cost, and increasing revenue, player LTVs and survival rates. 
Providing an enjoyable and memorable 'mobile-first' experience to players by driving personalization. 
To drive tangible and measurable returns that our players directly experience. 
The Head of CRM must deliver the Group's Contact Strategy in incremental amounts of activity, demonstrating value along the way, by each region where the Group operates.
Key Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢	Driving the development and improvements of the best in the class CRM program.
‚Ä¢	Effectively forecasting and managing the CRM Budget
‚Ä¢	Leading CRM projects, monitoring progress, resolving issues and initiating corrective actions as appropriate,
‚Ä¢	To ensure projects are completed within agreed timescales and budget, without compromising on data quality or user experience.
‚Ä¢	Developing strategies for risk mitigation and contingency planning. Maintain a dependency plan between planned iterations across program development, infrastructure, and third parties.
‚Ä¢	Ensuring that CRM Strategy ties in seamlessly with the Group Strategy. Implementing coordinated analytics and campaign management tools to measure success and delivery on Group strategy.
‚Ä¢	Working directly with Marketing, Product and Development, CRM and Business Development teams to analyze business requirements, forecast financial impact and validate diversification efforts.
‚Ä¢	Enable value-based investment and bonus cost optimization based on regularly refreshed value and activity scores within the operational layer. Support Senior CRM Analyst with building and optimizing segmentation and propensity models:
ÔÄ≠	Churn propensity and acquisition LTV models; targeted response to high likelihood lapse players, and a reduction in the application of bonuses to those who are unlikely to lapse.
ÔÄ≠	Cross-and Upsell strategy across products, sub-products and platforms based on propensity and efficiency models.
‚Ä¢	Distribution of governed and trusted data, to support marketing optimization and business diversification.
‚Ä¢	Use of tools for effective visualization and dissemination of campaign contribution and customer life stage KPIs across all the Group, regions and jurisdictions.
‚Ä¢	Undertaking and coordinating external benchmarking and conducting competitor analysis to highlight recommendations for improvements.
‚Ä¢	Ensuring the extended CRM team has a robust test-and-learn approach in everything we do.
‚Ä¢	Consistently question assumptions, challenge the status quo, and push for improvement and innovation never settle for being ‚Äúgood enough‚Äù.
Other responsibilities:
Working with key stakeholders to:
‚Ä¢	Make the analytical recommendations happen.
‚Ä¢	On-going improvement of the current analytical environment.
‚Ä¢	Improve the analytical process for prompt results.
‚Ä¢	Create good working relationships with the R&D and project teams.
‚Ä¢	Keeping abreast of professional knowledge by participating in training, maintaining personal networks and studying trends and developments within the industry.
‚Ä¢	Undertaking other reasonable duties as instructed by senior management.
Required Skills and Abilities
‚Ä¢	Customer focus and commitment to excellent service.
‚Ä¢	English full professional
‚Ä¢	Proven CRM experience in digital companies, preferable within the gambling industry.
‚Ä¢	Advanced Analytical skills.
‚Ä¢	Good interpersonal and relationship building skills; ability to work with technical teams, direct reports and strategic partners based remotely. Taking ownership of People issues as Line Manager right through to resolution.
‚Ä¢	Excellent verbal and written communication skills in English and Spanish. Ability to communicate complex ideas clearly; excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to build strong working relationships with the key stakeholders.
‚Ä¢	Accuracy and strong attention to detail.
‚Ä¢	Proactive and results driven approach.
‚Ä¢	Good organization and prioritizing abilities.
‚Ä¢	Exceptional creative thinking and problem-solving skills. Deep appreciation for the importance of elegant solutions to technical challenges.
‚Ä¢	Intuitive grasp of how different devices (mobile vs tablet vs desktop) impact CRM user journeys.
‚Ä¢	Passion for new marketing technologies and services.
‚Ä¢	Mobile first attitude; good understanding of user‚Äôs cross-device interactions and trends.
‚Ä¢	Integrity, maturity, composure under pressure and gravitas.

title: Unity Senior Developer
description:
Antiloop is a Barcelona based creative tech studio that brings extraordinary ideas to life. Our multidisciplinary and international team combines the physical, digital and virtual worlds to create fascinating projects for top companies and brands. We love to open up new paths to find unconventional solutions in the field of XR technologies.
JOB
We have been commissioned to produce an ambitious AR project for a premium automotive company and we are looking for a talented Unity senior developer to join our team. We would love to find a skilled developer with a visual and conceptual side. Not just someone who does the work, but who thinks critically and contributes to the creative process. 
As a first step we would like to work together on a freelance basis but this project is a great opportunity to know each other and this 
TECHNICAL KNOWLEDGE AND EXPERIENCE 
Candidates for this position must have a genuine interest in the latest technological developments in the industry to include Unity 3D development 
2/3 years of professional experience as a Unity developer 
Knowledge and experience developing XR apps ( specially AR and VR ) and familiarity with OpenXR, SteamVR and OculusVR Unity libraries. As well as some familiarity with the hardware used nowadays ( Oculus Rift S, Oculus Quest, HTC Vive pro and other XR-compatible HMD‚Äôs ) 
Ability to develop responsive interfaces, ideally  using Unity‚Äôs GUI features.
You have experience working with shaders 
Since you will be working in a team, you must have knowledge of version control platforms such as GIT or SVN 
MEETING ONE OF THE FOLLOWING REQUIREMENTS IS A PLUS 
Familiarity with 8th Wall platform
Familiarity with multipurpose scripting languages ( XML / JSON) 
Working knowledge of web development languages such as HTML, CSS and Javascript 
Backend web services development experience.
Deep knowledge on developing multiplayer/networked applications, both server and client side programming is desired.Proficiency in C# 
Knowledge of programming apps or games that consume RESTful web API‚Äôs.
Knowledge on data collection for analytics applied to games.
3D modelling, animation and rendering skills are desirable 
Familiarity with organizational tools such as Trello, Hack‚ÄônPlan or similar apps.
3D modelling, animation 
OTHER SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE
You have a focus on delivering quality work rather than speedy work 
You loveXR, AR, VR and Videogames in general ( Gamers welcome )
You can adapt quickly to changes and new feature requirements 
Experience working with Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator 
Strong knowledge of design principles, typography, user interfaces, Web standards and usability 
Team player with a positive attitude and an entrepreneurial spirit 
Available for periodic work related travel 
Must have an excellent level of English 
An at least intermediate level of Spanish is preferred 
Any other language is a plus!

title: Motion Designer
description:
Do you want to change the world through digital design by working on socially impactful and meaningful projects?
If your answer is yes, then this is the opportunity you've been waiting for!
OUR OPPORTUNITY:
----------
We‚Äôre in search for experienced, award-winning ILLUSTRATOR to develop interactive projects and impactful interactive experiences‚Ä¶ you‚Äôll work on both award-winning projects and day to day client needs. As our new ILLUSTRATOR, you‚Äôll work alongside our other in house Developers, Designers and Project Managers to lead our agency to higher heights and deeper depths.
You‚Äôll work closely with designers/creatives to develop top-quality interactive products and tools, whilst coordinating with Project Managers to deliver projects on time and according to client's expectations, standards and timings‚Ä¶In addition to this, you‚Äôll work on multiple projects simultaneously from initial briefing through to successful completion, you‚Äôll do this independently whilst at times collaborating with other members of the team.
YOUR EXPERIENCE:
----------
We‚Äôd love to hear from you if you have exposure and experience as a ILLUSTRATOR in an agency environment, who has won high quality and award-winning interactive projects. You‚Äôd also ideally have knowledge of Project Execution Methodologies (waterfall and agile) and be able to propose process improvements. Along with the above, you‚Äôll have knowledge of Project Management Softwares (Trello, Basecamp, Jira etc) and be fluent in the English language, both speaking, reading and writing.
You will:
+ Conceptualize and develop Moodboards, Storyboards, Styleframes and key-frames.
+ Design and animate vector illustrations, character design and animation, frame to frame, graphs, typography and other graphic elements
+ Collaborate with art directors, UX/UI designers and developers in projects involving illustration, animation and code.
You‚Äôll ideally have experience in the following technologies:
+ Recent and in-depth professional motion graphics experience
+ BFA in design/animation or related discipline
+ Ability to grasp complex topics and visualize them with easy-to-understand animations
+ Proficiency in Adobe After Effects, Photoshop, and Illustrator
+ Excellent storyboarding and conceptualization skills.
+ Static Illustration.
+ Moodboards and storyboard development.
+ Character Design.
+ Ability to follow design guidelines with an attention to details.
+ Has collaborated with designers and developers.
BONUS POINTS:
----------
+ 3D animation knowledge ( Cinema 4D, 3D Studio Max etc..)
+ Live Action project experience.Frame to Frame animation.
----------
ABOUT US:
At Elkanodata, we transform complex information and data, into insightful, innovative and attractive user experiences.
Our clients are international organizations and thought leaders that are based in the United States and Europe, including, The World Economic Forum, The World Bank, The European Union and the United Nations; specifically based in New York, Washington D.C and Geneva.
We identify as a Creative Design Agency that‚Äôs able to support our client groups across the digital spectrum ‚Äì Landing pages, websites, product launches and motion graphics.
We have an amazing and talented workforce that consists of digital designers, Art Directors, Front End Developers and Digital Project Managers to lead us to excellence.
OUR PURPOSE is to be the leaders in information design within inter-governmental organizations (IGO) by 2022, offering the highest quality work to our clients from our multicultural and diverse team located in Barcelona.
----------

title: PHP Programmer
description:
We are hiring a programmer to join our Web & Mobile team to help shape the back-end of our SaaS product and bring new features to life.
We welcome candidates of all different backgrounds to apply. Each new team member is an opportunity for us to bring in different perspectives, and we are always eager to further diversify our company. Biings is committed to building a supportive place for you to do rewarding and meaningful work.
About the job
The Web & Mobile team is composed of three people, whose work has lately given rise to our mobile app and a brand new front-end to the desktop version of Biings. You‚Äôll join the team and work closely with them.
The team works in Barcelona (Aticco MED), everyone has a dedicated desk, so will you. All team members speak either French, English or both.
Essentially, the W&M team is responsible for implementing, documenting and maintaining the Web and the Mobile version of Biings. The team works mostly on the front-end parts and uses our back-end API to retrieve and persist data.
We believe the back-end and front-end of any new feature should always be built simultaneously. The job is to join the W&M team and work on the back-end in close collaboration with the front-end programmers.
About you
We‚Äôre looking for someone with a good back-end PHP experience (1-2 years or more). Front-end programming experience, especially with Vue.js, is a plus but not a requirement. Here are some aspects of the job you should be comfortable with:
Back-end PHP applications
Laravel or similar frameworks
Object-oriented programming
Entity-relationship databases, and SQL queries
Code versioning and git branching
Being involved in the end-to-end lifecycle of features, from concept to deployment.
You won‚Äôt know all the frameworks and methods we use on day one, and we don‚Äôt expect you to. Solid fundamentals in software development and teamwork will be the most helpful.
This job is in-house in Barcelona. While you can work remotely on occasions, you should be comfortable working the majority of time together with the team, in the coworking space.
While we all speak English, our company is mostly composed of french-speaking people. English or French should be one of the strongest languages you speak. We very happily welcome of course people with any language background.
On top of open-mindedness and curiosity, we value people who can take a stand yet commit even if they disagree. We subject ideas to a lot of considerations and challenge each other often, yet we all know that we are here to do good work and create the best possible version of our software solution.
Who we are
Biings was founded in 2013 and is part of a group of three companies, all experts in collective performance and improving health at work. Today we‚Äôre a company of about 7 people spread across 3 cities with our headquarters in Morges, Switzerland.
We‚Äôre HR-engineers, designers, developers, learners, travelers, hikers, soccer players, moviegoers, climbers, snowboarders, kite surfers, dancers, knitters, yoga teachers, musicians, parents, and hard workers.
We make Biings (the product), we write code, support our clients and help them keep their company sustainable, people wise!
What we offer
Biings is an Equal Opportunity Employer and pays according to industry standards. The salary for this position is between ‚Ç¨30,000 and ‚Ç¨35,000 depending on your experience. We assess seniority during the interviewing process.
Benefits at Biings are all about helping you feel comfortable at work as well as outside of work. Work rate goes from 80% to 100%, with flexible working hours. Every year Biings offers 4 weeks of paid vacation and the standard national holidays. Your vacation time is prorated your first year at Biings.
Our office in Barcelona offers the classics of a comfy workplace, along with a few extra Yoga, Hiit and meditation classes. Also, if you like Switzerland, you can count on at least one trip to our HQ in Morges every year. The same goes for the team in Morges, so you‚Äôll get to welcome them too in Barcelona.

title: Product Manager
description:
At Domestika we are hiring Product Managers.
Reporting to the Head of Product and the CPO, as a Product Manager you will work with the Product team to build the highest impact projects that will help us drive and improve our platform.
Responsibilities:

‚Ä¢ Improving our entire platform.
‚Ä¢ Regular meetings with Product Managers to review business priorities.
‚Ä¢ Hands-on way of working in order to develop and launch new features.
‚Ä¢ Tracking core business metrics related to the product.
‚Ä¢ Surfacing and advocating key insights from the business to inform the Product team about possible improvements.
Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Minimum 4+ years of experience in product management.
‚Ä¢ Fluency in Spanish and English.
‚Ä¢ Good taste for design and user experience.
‚Ä¢ Experience gathering business insights and identifying trends from multiple quantitative and qualitative data sources and seizing business opportunities.
‚Ä¢ Experience working with software development teams and being familiar with agile product development process.

‚Ä¢ Excellent communication skills. Must be comfortable communicating with customers and internal audiences.
‚Ä¢ Experience in cross-functional collaboration and negotiation.
‚Ä¢ Experience in analytics tools.

title: Graphic & Visualization Designer
description:
*Maternity Cover - Barcelona or Reus* 
Are you passionate about design & analytics and would you like to work in an international, creative and young environment? If your answer is yes, keep reading!
ClearPeaks is a specialist Business Intelligence consulting firm headquartered in Barcelona with offices in Dubai and Abu Dhabi and sales presence in London. Since 2000, we have been delivering top quality data management & business intelligence solutions to customers in many industries such as Telecommunications, Sports, Entertainment, Finance, Retail, Real Estate and Oil & Gas. 
We‚Äôre looking for a highly talented, self-motivated and analytical candidate to join us as a Graphic Designer in Barcelona. This is a unique opportunity to work in a cutting edge sector being responsible for the overall branding of the company as well as acting as a creative design consultant in Business Intelligence Projects that range from classic BI to Big Data and Predictive Analytics. This is a maternity cover position for a period of 5 months minimum.  
The Graphic Designer will have 2 main responsibilities:
1.	ClearPeaks Marketing Graphic Designer:
‚Ä¢ Responsible for the design and creative input for all internal & external corporate documents
‚Ä¢ Design for newsletters, new website features & other digital documentation & collateral, following the ClearPeaks guidelines 
‚Ä¢ Responsible for the design of print material such as brochures and folders
‚Ä¢ Creation of unique & business relevant imagery for social media, web and other marketing collateral 
‚Ä¢ Optimize, from a design perspective, marketing content such as customer success stories, company sales documents, brochures & flyers, website, newsletters, blog articles, press releases
‚Ä¢ Lead the creation of corporate and recruitment video
2.	BI Project Graphic Designer:
‚Ä¢ Active involvement in BI/Data visualization Projects as graphic designer
‚Ä¢ UX design of projects
‚Ä¢ Creation of mock-ups and examples for BI projects (Dashboards, Reports)
